snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - T'ai Chi Ch'uan Prodigy and The Fist Of Innocence
snippet.description:
Two more iconic characters return to fight in the #DOA6 tournament.

Leifang, T'ai Chi Ch'uan prodigy, returns using  a variety of effective holds to gracefully counter enemy attacks, all the while hoping to prove her strength and capabilities as she pushes forward through the DOA Tournament. 

Joining Leifang is “The Fist of Innocence,” Hitomi. Hitomi being a Karate expert, specializes in using techniques that combine both offensive and defensive elements in one smooth strike.

[New Stage]
The two fighters will be highlighted at Gamescom on a freshly-added stage entitled Forbidden Fortune. The dynamic level features the ruins of an old pirate ship, with shattered bones scattered across the top deck, and mountains of gold found below as combatants smash through to the hull to find not only the hidden treasure, but a slew of hidden traps, not to mention, a giant Kraken guarding the stolen loot.

[official site] http://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/
[official facebook] https://facebook.com/Deadoralivegame
[official twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame
#DEADORALIVE6 #Leifang #Hitomi
